sentence.Network_en: But in Italy, you make a cappuccino in the morning or an espresso in the afternoon.
sentence.Network_cn: 在意大利, 人们早上喝奶沫咖啡cappuccino,下午喝“espresso”咖啡.

encyclopedia.content: “Espresso”是一个意大利咖啡语单词，有on the spur of the moment与“for you”（立即为您现煮）的意思。也许，翻译成“浓缩咖啡”并不见得合适，因此，在后面的单元里，将直接引用Espresso，不再使用译名。

entry.def: Espresso coffee is made by forcing steam or boiling water through ground coffee beans.

means.word_mean: 1. strong black coffee brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans
